values: 城镇；市镇；镇；乡镇；集镇；市区；城市中心；商业中心；市内商业区；（城镇的）商业区；居民区；城区常住居民；镇上的人；市民；城市生活

word_mean_info__list.difference: 一般指规模小的城镇，也指城市中的市区，有时也泛指城市。
一般指大城市或重要城市。

word_group.brief_definition: 郡首府；县政府所在地；县首府
彻底地（或热忱地，铺张地）做某事
排屋；连栋房屋；城市住宅；市政厅；镇公所
养牛区城镇；小镇；纯朴的小镇
设有邮局的镇；有邮政编码的镇

bilingual.source: What is your favourite town or city?
bilingual.target: 你最喜欢的城镇或城市是什么？

bilingual.source: Choose a country or town which interests you.
bilingual.target: 选择一个你感兴趣的国家或城镇。

bilingual.source: They sold their house and moved to another town.
bilingual.target: 他们卖了房子，搬到了另一个城镇。

bilingual.source: You can buy tickets the most quickly at Town Cinema.
bilingual.target: 你可以在城镇电影院最快买到票。

bilingual.source: Looking through my newspaper, I'm shocked by photos showing that a hurricane in Asia has destroyed a town.
bilingual.target: 看着报纸上的照片，我震惊于亚洲的一场飓风摧毁了一座城镇。

bilingual.source: I read the newspaper and am shocked by the photos, which show that a hurricane in Asia has destroyed a town.
bilingual.target: 我读了报纸，被照片震惊了，显示亚洲的飓风摧毁了一个城镇。

bilingual.source: The merc traveled from town to town looking for work.
bilingual.target: 这个雇佣兵从一个城镇到另一个城镇寻找工作。

bilingual.source: The carnie traveled from town to town with the circus.
bilingual.target: 马戏团工作人员随马戏团从一个城镇到另一个城镇。

bilingual.source: We take a walk in the town.

list.abstract: town（[taʊn]），英语单词，复数形式为towns，作名词为市镇；城镇；市区。短语搭配有ancient town（古镇）。例句为“The town square was totally full.（城镇广场上挤满了人。）” town相关近义词有ville、burgh。town一般指规模小的城镇，也指城市中的市区，有时也泛指城市，而city一般指大城市或重要城市。

yingyinNormal.en: Enjoy a few Arabian Nights at Madinat Jumeirah, a five star resort styled upon a traditional Arabian town.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在朱美拉古城享受几个阿拉伯式的晚上，这里是依照传统阿拉伯城镇建造的五星级渡假村。

yingyinNormal.en: I made one for myself, then all the girls at work wanted one. Then I showed some to this lady who runs a shop in old town.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我给自己做了一个，接着店里的女生也想要，然后我拿给在旧城镇开店的老板娘看。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Potato Comes to Town
yingyinNormal.zh: 土豆先生来到小镇

yingyinNormal.en: You have come from Lake-town.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是从长湖城来的。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I'm gonna go to tinker-town.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要去方便一下。

yingyinNormal.en: I return to town tomorrow. So soon?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我明天就回城了。这么快？

yingyinNormal.en: He says,"$30, Father. Same as in town."
yingyinNormal.zh: 他说30块钱，跟城里一样。

yingyinNormal.en: You won't believe who moved back to town.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，你们不会相信谁搬回来了。

yingyinNormal.en: Bitter Town. Aloneville. Hermit Junction.
yingyinNormal.zh: 愁苦城，孤独镇，隐士村！

yingyinNormal.en: A little bit noisy. Different part of town.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就是有点吵。城市的另一边嘛。

yingyinNormal.en: Your parents'? Yeah, they're out of town. Oh.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你父母家？对，他们出国了。

yingyinNormal.en: Julia. Olivia, I didn't know you were in town.
yingyinNormal.zh: 茱莉亚。奥利维亚，都不知道你来了。

yingyinNormal.en: I've been out of town all summer. Anything new?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我整个夏天都外出了，有啥新的吗?

yingyinNormal.en: At least from that little town we both call home.
yingyinNormal.zh: 至少不用再被束缚在那个我们称之为家的小镇。

yingyinNormal.en: No one enters Lake-town but by lead of the master.
yingyinNormal.zh: 除非城主带路，没有人进得了长湖城。

yingyinNormal.en: It took a broken town and rearranged the populace.
yingyinNormal.zh: 收下了一个废弃小镇，然后重新调整人口。

yingyinNormal.en: Bring it home, mamacita. Get outta town. What the...
yingyinNormal.zh: 约不约，神鹰帅哥？真是难以置信。什么？

yingyinNormal.en: My grandfather had gone into town to buy some Bengay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 外公进城去买药了。

yingyinNormal.en: DEA's office is across town, but they're sending back up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 缉毒局在城市的那头，他们派支援赶过来了。

yingyinNormal.en: This isn't their fault. Wait, you cannot go to Lake-town!
yingyinNormal.zh: 这和他们无关，别去长湖城。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: A <highlight>town</highlight> of culture award could, it is argued, become an annual event, attracting funding and creating jobs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有人认为，文化小镇奖可能会成为一项年度活动，吸引资金并创造就业机会。

examination_example.sentence: For the first time in history more people live in <highlight>towns</highlight> than in the country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 历史上第一次住在城镇的人比住在农村的人多。

examination_example.sentence: He favours out-of-<highlight>town</highlight> shopping sites against high streets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他喜欢远离街道的城外购物场所。

sense_info_list.en: the people who live in a particular town

direction_info.description:

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 镇；市镇；城镇；市区；市内商业中心；主要城市；城区；大学城常住居民

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>towns</highlight>, they live crowded together in tiny houses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在城镇里，他们一起挤在小房子里。

examination_example.sentence: France's tax on overnight stays was introduced to assist thermal spa (温泉) <highlight>towns</highlight> to develop, and around half of French local authorities use it today.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法国对过夜住宿征税是为了帮助温泉城镇得以发展，如今大约有一半的法国地方当局使用它。

word_family.mean: n. 镇；市镇；城镇；市区；市内商业中心；主要城市；城区；大学城常住居民

examination_example.sentence: Most of the village's 169 registered voters took part in the <highlight>town</highlight> hall meeting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该村169名登记选民中的大多数参加了市政厅会议。

examination_example.sentence: He hopes his acts of charity will influence others to spread positive actions in their own <highlight>towns</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他希望他的慈善行为能够影响其他人在自己的城镇传播积极的行动。

examination_example.sentence: A friend recently took her mother to visit an expensive assisted living/nursing home near my <highlight>town</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位朋友最近带她妈妈去了我镇附近一家昂贵的养老院。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 镇；市镇；城镇；市区；市内商业中心；主要城市；城区；大学城常住居民

examination_example.sentence: The new light feels like more than enough for the <highlight>town</highlight>'s sun-starved residents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于渴望阳光的居民来说，这种新的光线已经足够了。

examination_example.sentence: I think almost all the people in the <highlight>town</highlight> were there.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想镇上几乎所有的人都在那里。

examination_example.sentence: Boom <highlight>towns</highlight> grow from nothing almost overnight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 繁荣的城镇几乎在一夜之间从无到有。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 镇；市镇；城镇；市区；市内商业中心；主要城市；城区；大学城常住居民

examination_example.sentence: I went fishing with my father in the river near our <highlight>town</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我和我爸爸在我们镇附近的河里钓鱼。

examination_example.sentence: Also a nice home for them when you are out of <highlight>town</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你离开家乡的时候也是他们的好去处。

examination_example.sentence: Animals in or near the <highlight>town</highlight> became Dr. Dolittle’s patients.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 镇上或附近的动物成了杜立德医生的病人。
